short_summary: RFP for Supply and installation of a 1202m2 carpet in DC Embassy
description: The Embassy of Canada is seeking suppliers to install a carpet in the embassy in Washington DC. The carpet will be approximately 1202m2 and will be installed as described in annex A. Please see the annex for more details.
full_summary:
=================
### Tender Announcement for Carpet Installation at the Canadian Embassy in Washington DC

**Reference**: cb-923-8848948

**Public Notice Date**: November 15, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: December 13, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST

**Contracting Entity**: Global Affairs Canada

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada is seeking a supplier to provide and install approximately 1,202 m2 of carpet at the Embassy of Canada in Washington DC, USA. The contract will be awarded based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Notice Details

* Publication Date: November 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 13, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST
* Contracting Entity: Global Affairs Canada
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract End Date: To be determined
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: District of Columbia, United States of America

### Contact Information

For inquiries regarding this tender, please contact:
Yannick Harou, Contracting Authority
Global Affairs Canada
125 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0G2, Canada
(343) 553-3125, yannick.harou@international.gc.ca

### Attachments

Consult the attachments listed below for additional information:

* [24-250932---rfq---wshdc-carpet.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24727/24-250932---rfq---wshdc-carpet.pdf)
* [amendment-01-to-the-rfq-24-250932_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24727/amendment-01-to-the-rfq-24-250932_0.pdf)

Please note that the attachments are available on the [CanadaBUs website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). 

### Key Points

* The tender is expired.
* The Canadian Free Trade
